articles.description: The veteran BBC Golf commentator had been a mainstay of the channel and a broadcaster for 60 years
articles.content:
BBC golf commentator Peter Alliss has passed away at the age of 89.
The veteran broadcaster - long been considered to be 'the voice of golf' - had been hospitalised in September, and news of his dea… [+1892 chars]
